com.google.flightmap.common.geo
Enum NavigationUtil.DistanceUnits

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<NavigationUtil.DistanceUnits>
      com.google.flightmap.common.geo.NavigationUtil.DistanceUnits
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<NavigationUtil.DistanceUnits>
Enclosing class:
NavigationUtil
public static enum NavigationUtil.DistanceUnits
extends Enum<NavigationUtil.DistanceUnits>

Simplifies display of distances and speeds in various units.

Short distance units are used when the main unit distance is less than 1.0. Rather than showing fractional units, switch to a shorter unit (e.g. go from kilometers to meters).

Note there are no short speed units. There hasn't been a need for them, but they could be added here later if needed.
